content: materials - yarn a 2 4 skeins of purl soho s line weight 2 100% merino wool each skein is approximately 494 yards/100 grams approximately 975 1700 total yards required we used the color lotus flower for the scarf and cobalt turquoise no longer available for the wrap - yarn b for fringe 1 skein of purl soho s quartz 3 65% merino wool and 35% suri alpaca each skein is approximately 420 yards/100 grams approximately 55 95 total yards required we used the color wild lupine for the scarf and icicle blue for the wrap - us 3 3 25 mm straight or circular needles 4 - a small crochet hook 5 for tassels gauge 33 stitches and 50 row = 4 inches in stitch pattern sizes scarf wrap finished dimensions approximately 10 17½ inches wide x 72 inches long not including fringe designed for purl soho by katrina walser 7 based in sydney australia katrina is a knitting teacher tech editor and the designer behind oliphant kat 8 where she publishes simple modern pieces she s passionate about using her designs to help new knitters develop skills alongside the confidence to use them all images ©️ copyright purl soho 1 https //www purlsoho com/ticking-ribbed-wrap-bundle html 2 https //www purlsoho com/line-weight html 3 https //www purlsoho com/quartz html 4 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23802_23796 5 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23805 6 https //www purlsoho com/ticking-ribbed-wrap-bundle html 7 https //www instagram com/oliphantkat/ 8 https //oliphantkat com au/
